attributes.action: Investigate allegations of bias in media reporting on Israel-Palestine conflict
attributes.additional_details: We believe much of the media reporting regarding the Israel-Palestine conflict has shown a bias against Israel, which we believe damages UK relations and peace prospects.
attributes.background:
Unbiased journalism is essential to building understanding amongst communities, fostering tolerance, community cohesion and ultimately peace.
 
As such we call for Government to investigate allegations of bias in media reporting on the Israel-Palestine conflict, and take action to tackle any bias.

departments.name: Department for Culture, Media and Sport
